title: Simpo PDF Creator Pro v3.3 WinAll Incl Keygen-FALLEN [TorDigger]
description:
Simpo PDF Creator Pro

Create professional and standard PDF documents from most printable files: Office Word, Excel, PowerPoint, images, Html, and more.

-Convert and combine printable files into one PDF

-Create PDF in three ways: right-click, print and interface

-Preserve dominant hyperlinks from Word and PowerPoint to PDF

-Create bookmark in PDF from Word Document Map

Simpo PDF Creator Pro is designed to create 100% industry-standard PDF files in three ways: print, right-click and user interface. As it works as a virtual PDF printer, you can create PDF from most printable files, such as Microsoft Office documents, images (JPEG, PNG, GIF, ect.), Html web page, and more. Using the interface way, not only you can convert a collection of different types of files to PDF, but you can also combine them into a single PDF document.

Features:

Create standard PDF from many files
Simpo PDF Creator Pro creates standard PDF from many files, such as Word, Excel, PowerPoint, images like JPG, PNG, GIF, etc., .txt files, web page in .html, and more. Within the application, you can import a collection of different types of files and convert them to PDF format at a time.

Create PDF in three ways
Create PDF in three ways - virtual printer, right-click and user interface.

1. It works as a virtual printer driver to print a file to PDF format directly;

2. Or you can select a file, right-click it, then "Create PDF with Simpo PDF Creator Pro";

3. The interface way provides more advanced options to create PDF, it not just supports batch creation, it also allows you to merge many files into one PDF.

Combine multiple files to a single PDF
Open the PDF Creator Pro, you can not only add a batch of files to the interface for batch creation, you can also combine all imported files into a single PDF document. Right now, supported file formats are: Microsoft Word, Excel and PowerPoint; images like JPEG, GIF, PNG, BMP, and more; PDF.

Set password to protect created PDF
You can add simple but secure password protection to prevent printing, changing, copying or extracting with owner password, and do not allow opening by setting a user password. Preserve access to electronic long-term archives, by creating the files to ISO 19005-1 compliant PDF/A format documents.

More options to convert Office to PDF
Not just the original conents retained in output PDF documents, you can also preserve dominant hyperlinks active from Office Word and PowerPoint;
And you can create bookmark in PDF based on Document Map view in Word document.

Digital certificates claims
To claim rights that you are the owner of those created PDF files, you can insert the Meta Data information, such as Author, Title, Subject and Keywords.

Support multi language interface
Until now, English, Italian, Portuguese, German, French, Spanish, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese are available for your convenience to use Simpo PDF Creator Pro for creating PDF files.

Supported OS:

Windows 8, 7, Vista and XP

System requirements:

1. Creating pdf from doc, ppt, xls for Microsoft 2000/2002/2003.
2. Office 2007/2010/2013 is required to create pdf file from docx/pptx/xlsx.

Homepage: http://www.simpopdf.com/pdf-creator.html

Installation Instructions:

- Install program.
- Run keygen to get valid serial to register application.
- Done, Enjoy.

Have A Nice Day

Note: Uploader is only responsible if any problem in torrent, never responsible for software functionality problems.
